name: 9 LIVES (Pegaselkie)
description:
Curious the cat goes on a perilous journey to be able to taste fresh fish! Will you help her reach her goal before her 9 lives run out? Test your perseverance in this little game full of moments of surprise! 

- This game was made in 10 days for The GameDev.Tv Game Jam 2022 - 

DISCLAIMER: The WebGL version of the game doesn't work well with playerprefs functions so in order to have a better experience of the game and keep progress data, we advise you to download the game.

Because of time constraints, you can expect bug fixes and updates at a later time. We still hope you will enjoy the game as it is at the present moment and that you will be able to feel the passion we poured into it. We are just at the beginning of our game developing journey but we really tried to do our best! Have fun playing the game and let us know what you think about it if you enjoyed it. :D
